document_data.mainbody:
Klarv was a Night Blade who resided in the ruined Temple of Bhaal in the Undercity of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Klarv was a brown-haired and darker-skinned human woman armed with a crossbow.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Night Blade Elda Klarv was among the Cultists of Bhaal led by Cirian on a mission of venerating their evil deity through slaughtering of innocents in the Bloomridge Park of the Lower City. It was unknown if the slaughter was commenced or if the Bhaalists were stopped and slain by the Absolute Adversaries.
